name: Traffic (ironboundmanzer)
description:
A temporal paradox driving story of 15 people causing the butterfly effect.

WASD or arrow keys to drive.

Escape to rewind, Spacebar to resume or let the car rewind back to the start position.

No escape menu, Alt + F4 to close in game or wait for level to get over. Sorry.

10 levels no story. I have made the story version it is just in another computer will update soon. The game will be total of 45 levels.

Thanks please give feedback.
